It's a thrilling mystery film that requires you to follow clues and make decisions as the main character investigates the death of a young boy. If you're looking for a more lighthearted adventure, "Without a Paddle" might be right up your alley. It follows three friends on a camping expedition with unexpected twists and turns that will keep you entertained throughout the movie.

I'd highly recommend "300" for you! This action-packed film takes place in ancient Greece, where King Leonidas and his 300 Spartan warriors bravely face off against Xerxes' massive Persian army. The movie features a captivating performance by Gerard Butler as King Leonidas. Enjoy the fierce battle scenes and inspiring storyline!

Alternatively, if you're looking for another dramatic war film, "Rob Roy" might be just what you need. It follows Rob Roy MacGregor, a 18th-century Scottish outlaw who seeks revenge against those who wronged him while avoiding the Redcoats and dealing with Jacobite charges. Liam Neeson delivers a powerful performance as the titular character in this historical drama.
